item.title: Qt QProcess setWorkingDirectory Not Working on Windows System
item.author: m4rsquake@outlook.com (m4rsquake)
item.description: Introduction Recently, while working on a project using Qt, I noticed that even after setting the working directory for QProcess, it still couldn’t find the file, resulting in a failed startup. After researching online and reading the official documentation, I gained a clearer understanding of this issue.
